Articles.Content:
I present to you, the Gel Thruster.

A cross of solid and liquid engine, the gel booster is fairly useful, and cheaper than a liquid.

It uses fuel tanks, but is not as thrust variable as liquid fuel, and, most importantly, is cheaper!

Warning! Technical Backstory:

The gel booster uses a can of Unobtainum AbsolutebloodybullsitideTM to convert liquid fuel and an internal decaying solid fuel core into a new sustained explosive gel, perfect for sustained unit propulsion, but is unstable, and slightly reliant on extreme user caution. Will slowly overheat, and there is nothing you can do about it...

But is cheaper!

Makes a good, mostly balanced engine type addition to the stock part repertoire.

But is annoying to use.

But is cheaper!

BTW, I BORROWED NUCLEAR ENGINE MOD'S TEXTURE. BUT THE ENGINE PERFORMANCE IS VERY DIFFERENT.
Seems pretty cool. So it slowly overheats, and you can't really do anything about that?
It slowly overheats, AND you can't shut the bloody thing off to safely detach it. Perfect Kerbal Space Program material.
it actuaaly fits with the stock parts. Solid=unstable, lot o boost, Liquid=stable, controllable boost, Gel=Fairly Unstable, Average Boost

I believe that 'Unobtainum AbsolutebloodybullsitideTM' is the future of Kerbal Rockets!

questions

how much fuel does it store

Liquid Fuel Stores 400

solid stores 100

so we talking like 250?

also

what fuel Consumption would it have.

Liquid Fuel =8

solid 4 =

so would gel be 6?

thrust?

Liquid Fuel 200

Solid 130

are we talking 150 or 180?

Finally how much will the Bloody thing weigh?

Liquid 2.5 (full) + 2 (engine

solid 1.8

gel?

im crunching numbers now to try and find the pefect balance
The way you calculated it is wrong. Download the part and look at the CFG.

oh i see. i was under the impression you were making a Solid Booster Which has the Properties of a Liquid Engine. (i thought that the fuel tanks were part of it) silly me.

but further more does this mean you just use standard Liquid Fuel for the liquid Gel engine?

maybe your next Project could be Create a Fuel Which only works with that engine.

oh i see. i was under the impression you were making a Solid Booster Which has the Properties of a Liquid Engine. (i thought that the fuel tanks were part of it) silly me.

but further more does this mean you just use standard Liquid Fuel for the liquid Gel engine?

maybe your next Project could be Create a Fuel Which only works with that engine.

I think that multiple fuels are planned and/or tossed about. Gel fuel sounds like a hypergolic fuel. [Link][/http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypergolic]

Love the name of that compound! See you put the TM with it aswell. I think less explosive fuel types should be an option in the future. Maybe ones that look at your altitude and calculate their burn efficency and so add another challenge to orbiting and being successful.
For my next rocket fuel mockup, I might try, PURE UNOBTAINIUM ABSOLUTEBLOODYBULLSHITIDE!

For my next rocket fuel mockup, I might try, PURE UNOBTAINIUM ABSOLUTEBLOODYBULLSHITIDE!

God help us all! Couldn't that cause a massive explosion that could potentially affect the entire universe?

God help us all! Couldn't that cause a massive explosion that could potentially affect the entire universe?

Naaahh. I will potentially affect all the universes!

Mua ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

Universes VS. Universai

Which sounds better...

Affect all the universes/universais!?!?!? HELL YEAH! BRING IT ON!
This looks suspiciously like one of the first mod parts. The nuclear engine. It was EXACTLY THE SAME. You couldn't throtte it fully down, same mesh, same texture ect.
This looks suspiciously like one of the first mod parts. The nuclear engine. It was EXACTLY THE SAME. You couldn't throtte it fully down, same mesh, same texture ect.

I think less explosive fuel types should be an option in the future.

What about more explosive fuel types? Or are we never going to have access to those?
More explosive? Go get a can of CarolRawley's... unofficially TradeMarked compound. I must not mention it's name by threat of legal (unofficial) action and EDS (early death syndrome).

More explosive? Go get a can of CarolRawley's... unofficially TradeMarked compound. I must not mention it's name by threat of legal (unofficial) action and EDS (early death syndrome).

THATS RIGHT YOU WONT MENTION IT! THE LAST PERSON WHO USED MY TRADEMARK NAME ENDED UP BATTLING THE KERBOKAUR!!!!!!!
Yes. I realized that. That's why I didn't mention it. I am dedicated to the use of ********** ************************* in my rockets exploding things.
still close. i be watching you...
Yes kerbokaur handler.
handler? i keep it in kilometer deep pit below Diabolical Doodads HQ. We study it. We dissect its children.
I'm going to have to issue you with a galactic fine of 90 cents. You should be well aware that kerbokaurs must be kept in pits at least 2.1 km deep!
GAAR. I have only 1 cent in my piggy bank. YOU BANKRUPT ME!
Of course then there's tax and a admin fee. The total is 0.4 earth cents rounding to 0 cents overall thank you.
